name: Metagenomics
short_description:
The read-mapping algorithm is extremely useful in metagenomics research since it will be able to handle a large amount of data generated from next generation sequence (NGS) machine. 

This is a website to host a read-mapping algorithm named PISA. The project is supported by Thurgood Marshall College Fund (TMCF).  

The algorithm is based on the concept of a small set sub-sequence which called Punctuator. The punctuator can be used to uniquely match the sub-sequence, and then extended the alignment from the punctuator. The algorithm has two versions, one for single machine, and the other one for MapReduce framework.
